subject: Re: Design elements of website for word document
preview: I am sorry to be a pain Adriane, they did work this time but I need the green shape to be a higher resolution as it is blurry when I increase the size. It also needs to have a transparent background i

full_threads.body:
I am sorry to be a pain Adriane, they did work this time but I need the green shape to be a higher resolution as it is blurry when I increase the size. It also needs to have a transparent background if possible.

A version of the blue with green shape without the water mark would be great too, so I can adjust the height on our document. It takes up too much of the page 🙂

Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region

Hi Chrystal,

Thanks for letting me know about that. I’ve converted the images to PNG format so they should display properly this time -please see them attached.

If there’s anything else you need or if the images still don’t show as expected, just let me know. Always happy to help!

Thank you. Unfortunately, the image is not displaying within the email body.

Chrystal Goodhand

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like me to add.

Again, always happy to help!

Thank you Adriane

Do you also have the blue section at the bottom with the MZ watermark?

Hey again Chrystal,

Apologies for misunderstanding your request. Please see images of the Header Overlay.

If there’s anything else you need, just let me know. Always happy to help.

Good afternoon Adriane

Thank you for sending the Google drive link. We already have a copy of the brand guidelines, but thank you anyway. What I am looking for is an image file of the Blue and Green design element from the top and bottom of the website's home page (without the contact information). I will use this on the word document to carry through some branding to our internal docs.

I have attached screen shots again. Let me know if you are able to help.

Kind Regards

Chrystal

Hey Chrystal,

Thanks for reaching out again! You should find the assets you need in this folder:
  • https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1gEJAl1uVMQH3kuEg6yLD_q9EXtQRQkTw?usp=sharing

Access has been granted to cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au.

Just a heads-up for files are in .indd and .idml format: you’ll need Adobe InDesign to open those.

Let me know if you need anything resized or adjusted to better fit the Word doc, we’re always happy to help!

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body: I've already replied in the previous thread. Any further updates will be shared here moving forward:

Hello Team

We are currently updating some policies and we would like to add some branding elements to the header or footer of the word document. Wolf IQ completed our company Branding Guidelines a couple of years ago. We would like the policy document to compliment the website and wondered if the design element that you see at the top and bottom of each webpage could also be used in our word document? Perhaps a smaller version. I have attached screen shots of the areas I am referring to.

Are you able to send us an image file that would work for our policy document template?

Kind Regards
Chrystal



Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer
